title: Bloomberg Markets: Kharif on Initial Coin Offerings

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Olga Kharif Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing identifying successful startups amid the dozens of initial coin offerings taking place.
